gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Kings 123, Clippers 107
gameRecap.excerpt: De'Aaron Fox led the Kings with 33 points, six rebounds, and seven assists while Domantas Sabonis (17 points, 15 rebounds, 12 assists, three steals) and Harrison Barnes (22 points) added 39 points. James Harden (20 points, five rebounds, eight assists) and Kawhi Leonard (20 points, eight rebounds, four steals) led the Clippers in the loss. The Kings have now won three in a row to improve to 33-23 as the Clippers move to 37-19.
